name: ChatGPTwithDALL-E
0:
”Alexa GPT”
”How have you been lately?”
”Create an image of a sea otter”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: g. p. t.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Have a natural conversation with ChatGPT. The built in LangChain memory will remember conversational context, manage token usage for longer conversations, and even recall some details in later conversations. 

Ask ChatGPT questions as it's meant to be, get responses, and engage in natural language conversations on a wide range of topics. Whether you want to have a casual chat, get answers to trivia questions, or have a virtual conversation partner, ChatGPT is here to provide an engaging and interactive experience.

Say "create an image of" followed by your description and the skill will create an image via the openai DALL-E image generator and send it to you in an email. Please note that to create an image, you must enable the send email permission for this skill in your device's app.

Once installed, just say "Alexa open GPT" to start a conversation. Have three free conversations per month, five free DALL-E images per month.
